placeholderImages.description: A smart water bottle that tracks intake and glows to remind you to drink.
An ergonomic desk chair with lumbar support and adjustable armrests.
A compact, USB-rechargeable blender for smoothies on the go.
A sleek, fast-charging wireless pad for smartphones and other devices.
Over-ear noise-cancelling headphones with high-fidelity audio.
A non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat for all types of practice.
